trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Provo
There were no other sightings in Provo on or around November 26th 2002
Summary: i saw a disc shaped ufo crash on a mountain top at southeast corner of hiway 6 and 89
divs: sighting detailsit was thanksgiving evening and i was driving home from my sisters house in provo, utah and i was coming up over a rise on the rode(hyway 6) nearing the junction of hyway 6 and hyway 89. when through the front window of my car i saw what apeard to be a dark green disc shaped object that had a very bright halo of light that incircled it coming straight down toward the mountain top in the southeast corner of said junction. i only had about 5 seconds or less to see it before it crashed on that mountain top. i don't really remember hearing any kind of a loud crash sound or exsplotion, but the bright light that it gave off when it crashed was so bright that it lit up the sky so bright that you had to close your eyes for a couple of seconds. then the sky was pitch black again. when i neared the said hyway junction there was on the left side of the road about 5 or 6 vehicles parked there, and on the road coming off of hyway 89 to hyway 6 another 4 or 5 vehicles was parked there. i kept on going because i instantly thought that the milatary would be there very soon, and i have heard of what they do to eye witnesses to something like this. i arived home in price, utah about half an hour later and turned the tv on to see if there was anything about the crash. i watched for about an hour and there was no reports of anything so i called the local tv station in salt lake city(chanel #2) to see if there was any report of said crash and they said there was not. so i reported to the man on the phone of what i had saw and he said that he would report it , but i never heard anymore about it. this is my report to you and i would swear on a stack of bibles or take a lie detector test to the fact that what i have told is the god's honest truth thank you and i sure hope i hear from you...[witness' name removed\cms\tg]
